Description: Ostracon, section (three fragments joined) of the body of a light-brown pottery jar, the fabric is grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a reddish-brown slip, very faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text and many small black-spots.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:30-31 House T34.1 I.33 A/B/C
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393618) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393618)
